item.description:
Last year, Lexington residents Ines Fusco (a friend of our own Andy Marx), Cathy Gill and Christine Mitchell started a 5K that raised $5,000 to fight cancer. The race returns for its second year, and proceeds will go to the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society through the Team in Training program. I know several TMIRCE'ers have expressed interest, and I would love to give it a try - sound off and register at the link below.

http://resolutionrun2...

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 2nd Annual 5K Resolution Run to Kick Cancer, Saturday 1/8/11, Lexington
